translation.aboutme2: I am a software developer with experience in building complete web applications, covering both server-side and client-side development. As a full-stack developer with over two years of experience, I specialize in front-end development, creating interactive, scalable, and user-centered solutions. I design intuitive, functional, and optimized interfaces for web applications adaptable to mobile devices.
translation.aboutme3: Additionally, I have skills in multimedia design, including web design and other related areas. I am a self-taught professional, driven by continuous learning and committed to adopting new technologies and agile methodologies to add value to the teams and projects I collaborate with.
translation.skills2: Technologies, software, and tools that I have become familiar with throughout my career as a web developer.
